strings.evolution: One day I shall overcome my own weaknesses and doubts, and become a greater dragoon than my father!
strings.affinity:
First Cecil and now you...
Why am I always surrounded by sentimental softies?
strings.description: A young dragoon who appears in the tales of a blue planet watched over by two moons. Kain had his emotions manipulated once again by Golbez, leading him to betray his friend Cecil and his companions a second time. Yet no one felt more humiliated by this than Kain himself. Having finally returned to his senses, he rejoined his friends to defeat Zemus, the true enemy: an evil presence who had been pulling Golbez's strings from the very beginning.
strings.fusion:
You grant me...power?
I see we are all victims of curiosity. I shall repay this debt on the battlefield.
strings.summon: I never imagined someone would summon me to this world. If you are in need of my lance, I shall lend you my aid.

strings.evolution:
I will not betray my friends again.
If I lose control of myself...
You must cut me down.
strings.affinity:
First Cecil and now you...
Why am I always surrounded by sentimental softies?
strings.description: A young man from a distant world where two moons rise in the sky, his pride and honor as one of the elite dragoons make it difficult for him to unguard his inner self. Despite his deep affection for Rosa, he concealed his feelings upon realizing it was Cecil she truly loved. His emotions manipulated by Golbez, he reappears before his friend—now as a formidable foe. After rediscovering his true self, he joins Cecil in his quest, seeking to atone for his sins.
strings.fusion:
I am a dragoon.
I cannot bring disgrace to my rank.
Not...again.
strings.summon:
No-one can match my strength in the air.
The tip of my lance will pierce through evil!

strings.description: A young man from a distant world where two moons rise in the sky. Leader of the dragoons, the elite regiment of Baron, he is both a loyal friend and strong rival to Cecil. While possessing a strong sense of justice, he is not at ease expressing his emotions to others. Disillusioned at the actions of their king, he and Cecil both defect from their homeland, but become separated. He reappears as Cecil's adversary, his true motivations unknown.
strings.fusion:
Rosa... Cecil...
What should I have done differently?
strings.summon:
Heh...
I'll show you the true strength of Baron's elite: the dragoons...
